extendedInfo.description: classic Drop Blocks Game,This simple progressive puzzle game will test your skills over and over again throughout each level.Detonate groups of 3 or more same color blocks to win the level. The bigger the group the bigger the bonus you will receive.Clear a certain amount of lines per level to clear that level. The more lines you clear the higher your score will be.The amount more cleared lines you have at the end of the level the bigger your end of level bonus will be. Make sure that you have left very few lines at the bottom of the field with each level to get a bigger bonus. The higher your level the more lines you must clear.As you progress in levels you will start to receive bombs to help you either clear blocks or in some cases colored bombs will clear their same color blocks. Detonate and clear to win the game.How to Play:Tap to play this game.To challenge the limits? You could submit your score to scoreboard and compare with others in the world.Tags: action puzzle, blocks, bricks, color matcher, match 3ï¼Colored Blocks

reviews.title: This game gets me on my edge,.
reviews.author: karen Jones

reviews.title: Dissappointed
reviews.comment: It would b a great game, considering I love tetris, however, once u get into playing it, (I.e. over lvl 2), the block r not in a straight line (computer glitch maybe) I dwnloaded it a couple times. Same thing. And there r invisible piecs I guess. Plus without proper instruction on all piecs, like what do u do with the bombs that pop up, cuz u can\'t blowup anything that I could tell, then they disappear too. Anyway, its very hard to figure out this game and there\'s something wrong with it.
reviews.author: Pam Flinn

reviews.title: Too many turns to get to next unlocked levels
reviews.comment: Works great.. enjoy the challenge working around empty squares.. yes they aren\'t akways in straight line..but that makes it more challenging... just tooooo many levels to get to next unlocked level..still time consuming when I\'m bored..
reviews.author: Kitt Alwood

reviews.title: Rubbish
reviews.comment: Freezes in the middle of the game I got an android and its annoying when it freezes it only freezes on this game
reviews.author: Lucy Macdonald

reviews.title: 2 things to fix
reviews.comment: I like this, i just think it should have a button to automatically finish the line of blocks and it doesntt save the game if i leave the game and go to something else other than that i enjoy it.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Good game
reviews.comment: Fun to play, but does not save your progress.  That alone keeps me from playing all the time.  Not too many people. I know have a couple hours just to sit and do nothing but play a game.  It also ought to have a way to speed up the addition of new rows.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Ok
reviews.comment: Would be better if faster and if I kept your progress.... uninstalled
reviews.author: Eric Davis
